definition: to dare (negative connotation)/to have the audacity to (do sth)
gall bladder/courage/guts/gall/inner container (e.g. bladder of a football, inner container of a thermos)

sentences.english: Any dares who love to betray the soul, all have the power to change the world.
sentences.chinese: 任何膽敢爲愛出賣靈魂的人，都擁有改變世界的力量。

sentences.english: " The young man raged: "Dare you! Tell me, who wants me to be his grandson?
sentences.chinese: 你說，是誰不要命了，膽敢要老子做他的孫子？

sentences.english: " The young man raged: Jewelries "Dare you! Tell me, who wants me to be his grandson?
sentences.chinese: 你說，是誰不要命了，膽敢要老子做他的孫子？

sentences.english: If a son strikes his father, his hands shall be hewn off.
sentences.chinese: 如果一個兒子膽敢襲擊他的父親，他的手將被砍斷。
有什麼人膽敢數清他們？

sentences.english: We are determined to wipe out any enemy who dares invasion.
sentences.chinese: 我們決心消滅任何膽敢來犯之敵。

sentences.english: Those imperialistic English will be kicked out of the door, if they dare say it again.
sentences.chinese: 大英帝國將被我們踢走如果他們膽敢在這麼說的話。

sentences.english: Ha! Cursed 6)paleface, do you dare to enter the camp of Red Chief ?
sentences.chinese: 哈，該死的白臉鬼，你膽敢擅闖紅酋長的營地？

sentences.english: If our enemy dare to attack us, we'll punish them severely and crush them into pieces.
sentences.chinese: 敵人膽敢來犯，我們一定嚴懲不貸，打它個粉身碎骨。

sentences.english: I will hole you like a hive if you dare to touch my wife once.
sentences.chinese: 如果你膽敢碰我妻子一個手指頭，我就把你打成篩子。

sentences.english: Arf, arf, arf, who are you dare to come close to my house!
sentences.chinese: 汪汪汪，你是誰膽敢靠近我的屋子？

sentences.english: What hath thou created that thou doth dare question me?
sentences.chinese: 汝創造何物，膽敢質疑於我？

sentences.english: Tell me, who wants me to be his grandson?
sentences.chinese: 你說，是誰不要命了，膽敢要老子做他的孫子？

sentences.english: If the enemy dares to invade us, we'll deal them head-on blows.
sentences.chinese: 敵人膽敢進犯，我們就給予迎頭痛擊。

sentences.english: Are you presuming to tell me how to drive my car?
sentences.chinese: 你竟膽敢來指點我怎麼開汽車？

sentences.english: Any man who goes to sell his soul for love, got the power to change the world.
sentences.chinese: 任何膽敢爲愛出賣靈魂的人，擁有改變世界的力量。
